Nightlight::


Nightlight walked to the crashed ship, looking for a way to come in.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Starstomp: Alright, Wind. Yeah, guys. It think we have to go and 
look 
> for anyone in there. Who knows if they're even still alive.
>

> > Windlord/Nightlight::
> > 
> > "Yes"Said the male"One of the bots here named Terrataur will go 
to

the

find
